Q_DESC:
Given an array having both positive an negative integers . Your task is to complete the function maxLen which returns the length of maximum subarray with 0 sum . The function takes two arguments an array A and n where n is the size of the array A . 

Input:
The first line of input contains a number denoting the size of the array A. Then in the next line are space separated values of the array A .

Output:
Output will be the length of the largest subarray which has sum 0 .

Constraints:
1=N=100
-1000=A[]=1000
